about_the_game:
• DLC Summary:

    T.O.M is back and his invasion of Sector IV is underway. T.O.M has unleashed his new arsenal of enemies across a new portion of the Origin Sectors. After saving Sector VIII, Damon is ready to get back into the fray and defend yet another area attacked by T.O.M. Play across 15 new levels powered up by new enemies and unleash torment across Demrova, the new survival map.

  • Enemies:

    With new content comes new enemies. Fight against: The Gravity Node, an enemy that shoots Vortex's that pull you closer to the center of the bullet and slow you down as long as your caught inside. The Demolition Node, an enemy with a boomerang sawblade that can hit you from either direction and the Ricochet Node, an enemy with a projectile that can bounce against any surface. Upon hitting you, you get slightly knocked back and take damage that is increased for each time the bullet hit a surface.

  • Objectives:

    A new objective throughout the 15 levels is the Escape Objective, fight the clock to survive. Our normal level objectives return and we made sure to include more of the favorites. Collect keys, destroy spawners, obliterate generators and more.

  • Survival:

    A new Survival map, Demrova, comes equipped with the ability to level up your actives up to 3 times. Play across the destroyed factory of where Acidic Prime was made. What secrets lie within the ruins?
